sentences.en: She felt like an interloper in her own family.
sentences.cn: 她感到在自己家里像个外人。

sentences.en: She had no wish to share her father with any outsider and regarded us as interlopers.
sentences.cn: 她不想与任何外人分享她的父亲并把我们视为闯入者。

words.tran_cn: 闯入；干涉；[法] 侵占他人权益

trans.tran_cn: 闯入者，干涉他人事务者
trans.tran_en: someone who enters a place or group where they should not be
